original_title: 担任教師の僕は生徒の誘惑に負けて放課後ラブホで何度も、何度も、セックスしてしまった…
overview: The homeroom teacher, Mr. Haneda, receives a love confession from one of his students, Arina.  Despite being married, he finds it difficult to reject the most attractive girl in school, as it feels like winning the lottery.  Queen Arina is in absolute amazing shape.
title: I, a homeroom teacher, was seduced by a student and had sex with her at a love hotel after school… Arata Arina
